title: How does one prepare for the GMAT? - Quora

response.answer_text: HOW TO PASS THE GMAT IN 30 DAYS! My name is Nicole Ortiz. I found some GMAT preparation tips from Karyn Truong’s f/r/e/e ebo0k: MBAtips888. com/2020/01/top-31-tips-to-get-gmat-760-score.html. Karyn Truong is a famous CFO from KPMG in Chicago, USA. 1- Study every day. According to Karyn Truong’s advice, Start with the GMAT Official Guide to get a broad overview, and try to work on it consistently; even if you don’t complete it (you should use a variety of resources). Even if you’re working full time, you’ll need at least a couple hours in the morning and/or evening. Make sure you’re sleeping, but if you can take time off work, do. Don’t cram on the weekends only – that might work if you had 6 months, but with only one month to study, you’ll need to do at least some GMAT every single day.
